rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with a foyer that seamlessly transitions to the living space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A bohemian style living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to the south for abundant natural light and views.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern and functional kitchen space with bohemian elements and energy efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private and serene bedroom with bohemian decor, featuring ample natural light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet efficient bathroom designed with natural lighting and ventilation in mind.

openings.description: Double garage door for two-car parking.
Large main entrance complementing the bohemian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom that embodies bohemian charm with vibrant decor and natural light.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A versatile study area that can serve as a workspace or guest lounge.

openings.location: Adjacent to guest bedroom and study
openings.description: A balcony for open air relaxation.
Staircase connecting ground and first floors ensuring smooth vertical circulation.
